thread.title: The very best signs from the Women’s Marches
thread.title_full: The very best signs from the Women’s Marches

author: Dodai Stewart
title: The very best signs from the Women’s Marches
text:
By Dodai Stewart and Rafi Schwartz 
Across the United States and around the world, women—and their male allies—have taken to the streets in record numbers to protest President Donald Trump. From Washington to London to Mexico City and beyond, these Women’s Marches have had a single, unifying message for the new administration: “We are here, and we are not afraid.” 
Of course, that single message can come in many different forms. And like any good protest march, creativity is absolutely encouraged. With that in mind, here are some of the very best signs from the historic Women’s Marches. WASHINGTON, DC:
